question: the creation of human beings in the kumulipo happens during which wā or period of creation
vanilla_rag_result: The creation of human beings in the "Kumulipo" occurs during the transition from the section of "pō" (darkness) to "ao" (day). The "Kumulipo" is divided into two main sections: night, corresponding to divinity, and day, corresponding to mankind. After the birth of the first man and woman, "Kii" and "Lailai," the narrative illustrates the emergence of humanity. Therefore, human creation is associated with the transition from "pō" to "ao."
